translations: abbr.卫星红外辐射光谱仪（Satellite Infrared Radiation Spectrometer）；全身炎症反应综合症（Systemic Inflammatory Response Syndrome）；可溶性免疫反应抑制剂（Soluble Immune Response Suppressor）

phrs.translation: 尊敬的先生或女士（信笺的开头语）

sentences.sentence: "Dear sirs, my name is Sam Lee. I think I am the right person for the job," he wrote.
sentences.translation: “尊敬的先生们，我叫萨姆·李。我认为我是这份工作的合适人选。”他写道。
当然喽，先生们，我想你们不会。

sentences.sentence: "Some people think this is a game. No SIRS," said one leaflet.
sentences.translation: 有一张传单是这么写的：“有人认为这是在做游戏。”
